description: Update an existing endpoint. For more information about global endpoints, see Making applications Regional-fault tolerant with global endpoints and event replication in the Amazon EventBridge User Guide .

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the endpoint you want to update.

parameters.name: RoutingConfig
parameters.description: Configure the routing policy, including the health check and secondary Region. The failover configuration for an endpoint. This includes what triggers failover and what happens when it's triggered. The main Region of the endpoint. The ARN of the health check used by the endpoint to determine whether failover is triggered. The Region that events are routed to when failover is triggered or event replication is enabled. Defines the secondary Region.

nested_params.name: FailoverConfig
nested_params.description: The failover configuration for an endpoint. This includes what triggers failover and what happens when it's triggered.

nested_params.name: Primary
nested_params.description: The main Region of the endpoint.

nested_params.name: HealthCheck
nested_params.description: The ARN of the health check used by the endpoint to determine whether failover is triggered.

nested_params.name: Secondary
nested_params.description: The Region that events are routed to when failover is triggered or event replication is enabled.

parameters.name: ReplicationConfig
parameters.description: Whether event replication was enabled or disabled by this request. State (string) --- The state of event replication.

parameters.name: EventBuses
parameters.description: Define event buses used for replication. (dict) --- The event buses the endpoint is associated with. The ARN of the event bus the endpoint is associated with.

nested_params.name: EventBusArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the event bus the endpoint is associated with.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the endpoint you updated in this request.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the endpoint you updated in this request.

nested_items.name: RoutingConfig
nested_items.description: The routing configuration you updated in this request.

nested_items.name: FailoverConfig
nested_items.description: The failover configuration for an endpoint. This includes what triggers failover and what happens when it's triggered.

nested_items.name: HealthCheck
nested_items.description: The ARN of the health check used by the endpoint to determine whether failover is triggered.

nested_items.name: Secondary
nested_items.description: The Region that events are routed to when failover is triggered or event replication is enabled.

nested_items.name: ReplicationConfig
nested_items.description: Whether event replication was enabled or disabled for the endpoint you updated in this request.

nested_items.name: EventBuses
nested_items.description: The event buses used for replication for the endpoint you updated in this request.

nested_items.name: EventBusArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the event bus the endpoint is associated with.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the role used by event replication for the endpoint you updated in this request.

nested_items.name: EndpointId
nested_items.description: The ID of the endpoint you updated in this request.

nested_items.name: EndpointUrl
nested_items.description: The URL of the endpoint you updated in this request.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the endpoint you updated in this request.
